docstrings:
'''
---
module: cran
short_description: Install R packages.
options:
  name:
    description:
      - The name of an R package.
    required: true
    default null
  state:
    description:
      - The state of module
    required: false
    choices: ['present', 'absent']
    default: present
  repo:
    description:
      - The repository
    required: false
    default: "https://cran.rstudio.com/"
'''
